Time And Distance

Time And Distance

  • 1 Imex = 1 second
    • Interum = 100 Imex
  • 1 Caldex = ~1.1 days
    • Ritodex = 10 Caldex
    • Kaydex = 30 Caldex
  • 1 Adex = .959 years

Micro Time Format Description:

Inter-Seta-Inem (somewhat equivalent to “hour-minute”)

Imex = 1 second
Interum = 100 imex
Setadex = 1,000 imex(16 minutes)
Interdex = 10,000 imex(slightly less than 3 hours)
Caldex = 100,000 imex(slightly less than 28 hours)
Ritodex = 10 Caldex
Kaydex = 30 Caldex

Ada-Kayd-Caldex (day-moth-year equivalent)

Adex = 10 Kaydex/300 Caldex
Ketdex = 10 Adex (Ket Cycle)
Soradex = 100 Adex (Soral Cycle)
Tekadex 1,000 Adex (Teka Cycle)
Heptadex = 10,000 Adex (Heptagex Cycle)
Metadex = 1,000,000 Adex (Metalogos Cycle)
Deonox = 1,000,000,000 Adex (Deonoxium Cycle)

Macro Format Description:

Time Examples

Edoch: An interval of 100,000,000 adex.
Deo-Meta-Teka-Ad

24.345.687.230
is:

24th Deonox, 345th Metadex, 687th Tekadex, 230th Adex Adex 230, Edoch 345.678 of the 24th Deonoxium

Shortened:
24dx-345678-230ad
citation date
5-17-54-1009 « in the second Soral Cycle of current Edoch

Distance

Stardex is the distance light travels in an Adex
Setch = inch equivalent
Setta = 20 setch
Lirhetta = 40 setch (~1 meter, 1 meter = ~39.4 setch)
Tekudex = 100,000 setch (~a mile and a half) or 5000 setta
Hatadex = 10,000 Tekudex
Metradex = 1,000,000 Tekudex
Dexardex = 1,000,000,000 Tekudex

Micro Distance

Nama-setch = 10th of a setch
Seggeta = 100th of a setch
Nama-seggata = 1000th of a setch

cabre: used for small circumferences
